titleStmt.title: The Christian mans care A sermon on Matth. 6. 33. Together with a short catechisme for the simpler sort. By Thomas Gataker, B. of D. and pastor of Rotherhith.
titleStmt.author: Gataker, Thomas, 1574-1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Haviland, for Fulke Clifton, and are to be sold at his shop upon new Fishstreet Hill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop upon new Fishstreet Hill
